original_text: But the Israelites encouraged one another and again took up their positions where they had stationed themselves the first day.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들이 스스로 용기를 내어 첫날 전열을 갖추었던 곳에서 다시 전열을 갖추니라

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites encouraged one another
and again took up their positions

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 첫날에 자리를 잡았던 바로 그곳에서
